entry.title: Sri Lanka's Economic Chaos Reverses Steady Rise of Middle Class
entry.content: Anger over the crumbling economy spurred many in the middle class to join mass demonstrations, which political analysts say was a tipping point in the protests that ultimately toppled the previous president, Gotabaya Rajapaksa.

entry.title: Russia Pummels Ukraine's Mykolaiv, Killing Top Businessman
entry.content: The southern port city suffered some of the worst barrages of the war, while Moscow reported a drone attack on the headquarters of its Black Sea Fleet.
